title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3026/84 of 30 October 1984 extending the period of validity of Regulation (EEC) No 2826/77 introducing a Community transit declaration form for use in automatic or electronic data-processing systems
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3026/84
of 30 October 1984
extending the period of validity of Regulation (EEC) No 2826/77 introducing a Community transit declaration form for use in automatic or electronic data-processing systems
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the second paragraph of Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 2826/77, '31 December 1984' is hereby replaced by '31 December 1986'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 October 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 38, 9. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1982, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 333, 24. 12. 1977, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 310, 6. 11. 1982, p. 11.
